'''Damon''' is an employee of [[Circus Liquor]] who was held hostage when his ex-girlfriend [[Kelly (In Which Sam Gets Taken for a Ride)|Kelly]] robbed the place.

==History==
Damon was working at [[Circus Liquor]] when [[Kelly (In Which Sam Gets Taken for a Ride)|Kelly]] came in with a gun to rob the place. She shot Damon in the leg and took him, plus [[Sara Hill]] and [[Jan]], hostage. Sara called [[Sam Bennett]], the only doctor she knows who does house calls, to come take care of Damon's leg. He did so, but then Kelly revealed that she was in labor and ordered him to deliver her baby. He did so with help from Naomi, particularly after the baby got stuck and had to be rotated. Sam then handed the baby off to Damon and called the police to come get Kelly.

==Relationships==
===Romantic===
He was seeing [[Kelly (In Which Sam Gets Taken for a Ride)|Kelly]]. She got pregnant, but he decided to break up with her.

===Familial===
He has a daughter with Kelly. He took the job at Circus Liquor to help Kelly support the baby.

==Career==
He works at [[Circus Liquor]].
